Ward–Mill five cards. [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player mills five cards.)[/i]
Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent’s turn, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. [i](A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)[/i]
notes:
New card — Replaced Fata Morgana

Given blue already has a mass-bounce boardwipe and a way to create token copies — both of which can rebuy ETBs down the road — I wanted to open this up to be a dedicated flash payoff.
